name: @microservices-suite/payment-service
description: The payment service orchestrates the secure processing of financial transactions within our microservices-based platform. It seamlessly integrates with various payment gateways and ensures smooth handling of payment requests, including authorization, capture, and settlement. With robust error handling and transaction logging, it guarantees reliability and accountability in financial operations. Designed for scalability and compliance, it supports multiple currencies, payment methods, and regulatory requirements, providing a seamless payment experience for our users and enabling the monetization of our services.
author: Gilbert Andanje
